params.name: type

params.displayName: One or more ratings, comma separated or JSON array depending on your request format
params.name: content_rating

params.displayName: The custom string to use in this On Demand page's Vimeo URL
params.name: link

params.displayName: The On Demand page's custom domain
params.name: domain_link

params.displayName: Required if buy.active is false
params.name: rent.active

params.displayName: Required if rent.active is true. If this On Demand page is a `film`, this is the price to rent the film. If `series`, this is the price to rent the entire collection
params.name: rent.price.USD

params.displayName: Required if rent.active is true
params.name: rent.period

params.displayName: Required if rent.active is false
params.name: buy.active

params.displayName: Required if buy.active is true. If this On Demand page is a `film`, this is the price to purchase the film. If `series`, this is the price to purchase the entire collection
params.name: buy.price.USD

params.displayName: Required if episodes.rent.active is true. Only applicable if this On Demand page is a series. This is the default price for each individual episode
params.name: episodes.rent.price.USD

params.displayName: Required if episodes.rent.active is true
params.name: episodes.rent.period

params.displayName: Required if episodes.buy.active is true
params.name: episodes.buy.price.USD
